sn34.5:1.4: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco jhayi samadhismim samadhikusalo hoti, na samadhismim arammanakusalo.
sn34.5:1.5: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhayi samadhismim arammanakusalo hoti, na samadhismim samadhikusalo.
sn34.5:1.6: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhayi neva samadhismim samadhikusalo hoti, na ca samadhismim arammanakusalo.
sn34.5:1.7: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhayi samadhismim samadhikusalo ca hoti, samadhismim arammanakusalo ca.
sn34.5:1.8: Tatra, bhikkhave, yvayam jhayi samadhismim samadhikusalo ca hoti samadhismim arammanakusalo ca ayam imesam catunnam jhayinam aggo ca settho ca mokkho ca uttamo ca pavaro ca.
